entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
